column3: Visa "AL- Tamweel Net", Card Type = Credit Card. Visa "AL- Tamweel Net", Overview = Whenyouseek the maximum freedom in shopping online, subscribing to your favorite websites or receiving online services, Visa "Tamweel Net", is your perfect choice. It offers the highest levels of security and easiest payment terms by deducting the due amounts on monthly basis.. Visa "AL- Tamweel Net", Card Benefits (English) = - Credit limit from KD 50 up to KD 200. - Salary transfer is not mandatory in order to issue the card, instead, an amount of money equivalent to credit limit can be reserved. - Free e-statement option available. - Card balance can be reviewed online through KFH Online service or through KFH App. - Safe and secure payment online with 3D Secure service. - Noextra percentage added to the total due amount. - Not considered among client's.
